scripts.install: echo "Root install skipped. Dependencies are handled per app."
scripts.build: if [ -d "my-app/client" ]; then npm run build --prefix my-app/client; else echo 'No client to build'; fi
scripts.start: if [ -f "my-app/server/index.js" ]; then npm start --prefix my-app/server; elif [ -d "my-app/client/build" ]; then npx serve -s my-app/client/build -l 3000; else echo 'Nothing to start'; exit 1; fi
